description: I am an Industrial Engineering student at Beykent University with a keen interest in finance, blockchain technology, programming languages, and artificial intelligence. Passionate about creating innovative solutions and problem-solving, my current skills include Python, C#, Solidity. I am actively learning and striving to advance my expertise, particularly in AI.
detailOrQuote: Driven by a passion for innovation and problem-solving, I am committed to continuously learning and enhancing my skills. My goal is to contribute to the tech industry by developing web applications, smart contracts, databased applications, and machine learning programs. I have a growing interest in JavaScript, Rust, and Flutter.
